law.catch_line: Portion of savings identified in KRS 196.286 to be used to expand treatment programs in existing state penal institutions.
law.text: The department shall use a portion of the savings identified in KRS 196.286 to expand treatment programs at its existing state penal institutions, including the expansion or creation of treatment programs at facilities that are currently being underutilized if those facilities are appropriate locations for treatment programs or could be modified easily to accommodate treatment programs.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 24, effective June 8, 2011.
